scripts.build: npm run reset-dist && concurrently -n static,sass,js "npm run build-static" "npm run build-sass" "npm run build-js"
scripts.watch: npm run reset-dist && concurrently -k -n static,sass,js,lint "npm run watch-static" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-lint"
scripts.watch-sass: concurrently -n sass,sass "npm run build-sass" "npm run build-sass -- --watch"
